25 // some important Tag Idents (TTagHead.Ident) that we will need to read the most common content of a PTU file
26 // check the output of this program and consult the tag dictionary if you need more
27 #define TTTRTagTTTRRecType "TTResultFormat_TTTRRecType"
28 #define TTTRTagRes "MeasDesc_Resolution" // Resolution for the Dtime (T3 Only)
29 #define TTTRTagGlobRes "MeasDesc_GlobalResolution" // Global Resolution of TimeTag(T2) /NSync (T3)
30 #define FileTagEnd "Header_End" // Always appended as last tag (BLOCKEND)
31 
32 #define tyEmpty8 0xFFFF0008
33 #define tyBool8 0x00000008
34 #define tyInt8 0x10000008
35 #define tyBitSet64 0x11000008
36 #define tyColor8 0x12000008
37 #define tyFloat8 0x20000008
38 #define tyTDateTime 0x21000008
39 #define tyFloat8Array 0x2001FFFF
40 #define tyAnsiString 0x4001FFFF
41 #define tyWideString 0x4002FFFF
42 #define tyBinaryBlob 0xFFFFFFFF
43 
44 #define rtPicoHarpT3 0x00010303 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $03 (T3), HW: $03 (PicoHarp)
45 #define rtPicoHarpT2 0x00010203 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $03 (PicoHarp)
46 #define rtHydraHarpT3 0x00010304 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $03 (T3), HW: $04 (HydraHarp)
47 #define rtHydraHarpT2 0x00010204 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $04 (HydraHarp)
48 #define rtHydraHarp2T3 0x01010304 // (SubID = $01 ,RecFmt: $01) (V2), T-Mode: $03 (T3), HW: $04 (HydraHarp)
49 #define rtHydraHarp2T2 0x01010204 // (SubID = $01 ,RecFmt: $01) (V2), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $04 (HydraHarp)
50 #define rtTimeHarp260NT3 0x00010305 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V2), T-Mode: $03 (T3), HW: $05 (TimeHarp260N)
51 #define rtTimeHarp260NT2 0x00010205 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V2), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $05 (TimeHarp260N)
52 #define rtTimeHarp260PT3 0x00010306 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T3), HW: $06 (TimeHarp260P)
53 #define rtTimeHarp260PT2 0x00010206 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $06 (TimeHarp260P)
54 #define rtMultiHarpNT3 0x00010307 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T3), HW: $07 (MultiHarp150N)
55 #define rtMultiHarpNT2 0x00010207 // (SubID = $00 ,RecFmt: $01) (V1), T-Mode: $02 (T2), HW: $07 (MultiHarp150N)

91 typedef struct {
92  char Ident[16]; //"PicoHarp 300"
93  char FormatVersion[6]; //file format version

173 typedef struct {
174  unsigned macro_time_clock :24; // the resolution of the macro time

177 } bh_spc132_header_t;

182 typedef struct tag_head {
183  char Ident[32]; // Identifier of the tag
184  int Idx; // Index for multiple tags or -1
185  uint32_t Typ; // Type of tag ty..... see const section
186  uint64_t TagValue; // Value of tag.
187 } tag_head_t;
